oscuro Gellert Grindelwald (Johnny Depp) fue capturado por MACUSA (Congreso M\u00e1gico de los Estados Unidos de Am\u00e9rica), con la ayuda de Newt Scamander (Eddie Redmayne). Pero, cumpliendo con su amenaza, Grindelwald escap\u00f3 de su custodia y ha comenzado a reunir seguidores, la mayor\u00eda de los cuales no sospechan sus verdaderas intenciones: alzar a los magos purasangre para reinar sobre todas las criaturas no m\u00e1gicas. En un esfuerzo por frustrar los planes de Grindelwald, Albus Dumbledore (Jude Law) recluta a su antiguo estudiante Newt Scamander, quien accede a prestar su ayuda, sin conocer los peligros que aguardan. Las l\u00edneas quedan marcadas mientras el amor y la lealtad son puestos a prueba, incluso entre los amigos m\u00e1s cercanos y la familia, en un mundo m\u00e1gico cada vez m\u00e1s dividido.","cast":[{"name":"Eddie Redmayne","role":"Newt Scamander","images":{"face":"\/2b\/70\/2b7090dec47424ec75a5836b0c5ede51.jpg"},"id":12276},{"name":"Katherine Waterston","role":"Tina Goldstein","images":{"face":"\/38\/ce\/38ceff8ca6ed04379e167659f9a87ea5.jpg"},"id":12050},{"name":"Dan Fogler","role":"Jacob Kowalski","images":{"face":"\/0c\/4c\/0c4ccb88b8b12ae2eb4780eac59b413f.jpg"},"id":9727},{"name":"Alison Sudol","role":"Queenie Goldstein","images":null,"id":60407},{"name":"Ezra Miller","role":"Credence Barebone","images":{"face":"\/6c\/fb\/6cfbf689f3442174c4ae871a6875ca9f.jpg"},"id":432},{"name":"Jude Law","role":"Albus Dumbledore","images":{"face":"\/ae\/b8\/aeb82ad75d9524d4364a10e2992b6b32.jpg"},"id":1470},{"name":"Johnny Depp","role":"Gellert Grindelwald","images":{"face":"\/f0\/2c\/f02cf77dbedcf318cedf4e436ebfbcb6.jpg"},"id":4906},{"name":"Zo\u00eb Kravitz","role":"Leta Lestrange","images":{"face":"\/a5\/f5\/a5f5bb230b715bb2dfcfe37253003955.jpg"},"id":22724},{"name":"Carmen Ejogo","role":"Seraphina Picquery","images":{"face":"\/cd\/e5\/cde558c287cb12cc95c9b8498c9ef554.jpg"},"id":16074},{"name":"Claudia Kim","role":"Nagini","images":null,"id":41484}],"composer":{"name":"James Newton Howard","images":null,"id":70298},"genres":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"distributor":null,"numInteractions":10743,"numRatings":3397,"ratingHistogram":{"1":50,"2":132,"3":693,"4":1871,"5":651},"seasonsBlocked":[],"producers":[{"name":"Heyday Films","images":null},{"name":"Warner Bros.","images":null}],"writers":[{"name":"J.K.
